item.title: MindTouch SSO using HttpClient 4.1 with Java
item.description: Most of the MindTouch sample code available in the wild is in PHP or C# so integrating with a Java stack can be painful. Here's a snip of the code we used to support SSO with our Java-based SaaS platform. The HttpClient framework is version 4.1 of Apache's HttpClient
